channel.title: phone on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in phone on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-04
item.description: Netflix is launching a daily trivia series called Trivia Quest (2 minute read) Netflix’s new interactive series Trivia Quest will launch on April 1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-07
item.description: Google Stream is what Stadia should have been from the start (3 minute read) Google Stream is a backend cloud gaming technology that Google is pitching to businesses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-21
item.description: Google’s foldable phone plans include two devices, Android 12.1 release (4 minute read) Google is rumored to be working on two foldable phones and incorporating foldable functionality into an out-of-cycle update to Android.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-05
item.description: Personal data of 533 million Facebook users leaks online (3 minute read) Personal data from 533 million Facebook accounts was recently leaked online.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-13
item.description: Visa and Plaid call off $5.3 billion merger after Justice Department objection (3 minute read) Visa and Plaid have terminated plans to merge following antitrust pushback from the Department of Justice.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-05
item.description: Apple imagines a foldable iPhone with a ‘self-healing’ display (2 minute read) Apple filed a patent in January for a foldable smartphone with a self-healing display that could repair dents or scratches on the screen.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-13
item.description: The Surface Duo, Microsoft’s first-ever Android phone, is $1,400 (6 minute read) The Surface Duo is now available for pre-order and will ship on September 10.
